Charlie: "Diana, that's a bold claim. If you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me last night? It seems odd you'd have a result on me when Alice was killed."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night before Alice was killed and confirmed he is the mafioso. I understand the suspicion, but this info is critical to stop more deaths."

Diana was arrested
